v.v: Yahweh, people should praise you alone;
It is not right that other people groups should say about us,
But their idols are only statues made of silver and gold,
Their idols have mouths, but they cannot say anything;
They have ears, but they cannot hear anything;
They have hands, but they cannot feel anything;
The people who make those idols are as powerless as those idols,
You, my fellow Israelite people, trust in Yahweh!
You priests, descendants of Aaron, trust in Yahweh!
All you who have a reverential respect for Yahweh, trust in him!
and he will bless all those who have a reverential respect for him;
I wish that Yahweh may give many children
I wish that Yahweh, the one who made heaven and the earth, may bless all of you!
The highest heavens belong to Yahweh,
Dead people are not able to praise Yahweh;
But we who are alive will thank him,

v: they must praise you, not us,
because you faithfully love us and always do what you have promised to do.
“They claim that their God is very powerful,
but if that is true, why does he not help them?”
and he does whatever he wants!
things that humans have made.
they have eyes, but they cannot see anything.
they have noses, but they cannot smell anything.
they have feet, but they cannot walk,
and they cannot even make any sounds in their throats!
and those who trust in those idols can accomplish nothing, just like their idols!
He is the one who helps you and protects you like a shield.
He is the one who helps you and protects you like a shield.
He is the one who helps you and protects you like a shield.
he will bless us Israelite people!
He will bless the priests,
he will bless important people and people who are considered to be unimportant, everyone!
to you, my fellow Israelite people, and to your descendants.
but he gave everything that is on the earth to us people.
when they descend into the place where dead people are,
they are unable to speak and cannot praise him.
now and forever.
Praise Yahweh!
